languages.text: "Когда поведал я тебе о судьбе своих братьев, Арнульфа и Скьядди, не славил{mf||а} ты их подвиг, лишь горькие слова изрек{mf||ла} о неизбежности смерти. Дух мой отозвался в тот миг".

"When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. I knew those words were true."
languages.original_text: "Когда поведал я тебе о судьбе своих братьев, Арнульфа и Скьядди, не славил{mf||а} ты их подвиг, лишь горькие слова изрек{mf||ла} о неизбежности смерти. Дух мой отозвался в тот миг".

traits.locale_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. My spirit responded in that moment."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. My spirit responded in that moment."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. My spirit responded in that moment."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. I knew those words were true."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando le conté qué había sido de mis hermanos Arnoolf y Skyaddi, no alabó su muerte gloriosa, sino que solo musitó amargamente sobre la inevitabilidad de la muerte. Supe que sus palabras eran verdaderas».
languages.original_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. I knew those words were true."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando le conté qué había sido de mis hermanos Arnoolf y Skyaddi, no alabó su muerte gloriosa sino que solo musitó amargamente sobre la inevitabilidad de la muerte. Eso resonó con mi espíritu».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “当我告诉你，我的兄弟阿努尔夫和海加迪遭遇了什么事情，你没有赞美他们的光荣事迹，只是道出了苦涩的真相，诉说着不可避免的死亡。我当时很清楚，你说得都对。”
languages.original_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. I knew those words were true."

traits.locale_text: “当我告诉你，我的兄弟阿努尔夫和海加迪遭遇了什么事情，你没有赞美他们的光荣事迹，只是道出了苦涩的真相，诉说着不可避免的死亡。那一刻，我的灵魂得到了回应。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺が兄弟のアーノルフとスキアディに起こった出来事を話したとき、あんたはふたりの輝かしい行為を称えることもなく、死は避けられないと辛辣な言葉を吐いた。あの言葉は真実だと分かっていたさ」
languages.original_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. I knew those words were true."

traits.locale_text: 「俺が兄弟のアーノルフとスキアディに起こった出来事を話したとき、あんたはふたりの輝かしい行為を称えることもなく、死は避けられないと辛辣な言葉を吐いた。あの言葉は真実だと分かっていたさ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Quand je vous ai dit ce qui était arrivé à mes frères Arnoolf et Skyaddi, au lieu de rendre hommage à leur bravoure, vous n'avez fait que commenter froidement le caractère inéluctable de la mort. Et je savais bien que vous disiez vrai. »
languages.original_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. I knew those words were true."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je vous ai dit ce qui était arrivé à mes frères Arnoolf et Skyaddi, au lieu de rendre hommage à leur bravoure, vous n'avez fait que commenter froidement le caractère inéluctable de la mort. C'est à ce moment-là que mon esprit a réagi. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Als ich Euch vom Schicksal meiner Brüder Arnoolf und Skyaddi berichtet habe, habt Ihr nicht ihre glorreichen Taten gelobt, sondern nur bittere Worte über die Unausweichlichkeit des Todes verloren. Ich wusste, dass diese Worte wahr waren."
languages.original_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. I knew those words were true."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich Euch vom Schicksal meiner Brüder Arnoolf und Skyaddi berichtet habe, habt Ihr nicht ihre glorreichen Taten gelobt, sondern nur bittere Worte über die Unausweichlichkeit des Todes verloren. In diesem Augenblick hat mein Geist reagiert."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. I knew those words were true."

languages.text: "Sana düşmüş kardeşlerim Arnoolf ve Skyaddi'den bahsettiğimde onların şanlı görevlerini övmedin. Ölümün kaçınılmazlığı hakkında acı gerçekleri konuştun. Sözlerinin hakikat olduğunu biliyordum."
languages.original_text: "When I told you about what had befallen my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you did not praise their glorious deed, but only loosed bitter words about the inevitability of death. I knew those words were true."

traits.locale_text: "Sana düşmüş kardeşlerim Arnoolf ve Skyaddi'den bahsettiğimde onların şanlı görevlerini övmedin. Ölümün kaçınılmazlığı hakkında acı gerçekleri konuştun. Sözlerinin hakikat olduğunu biliyordum."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
